lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. The Multiple Myeloma Research Foundation (MMRF) mourns the loss of our dear friend, inspiration, hero, and supporter Elie Wiesel. Elie inspired generations with his teachings of peace, justice and human rights activism, and approached everything in life with perseverance and bravery. We send our thoughts and prayers and pledge our deepest support to his remarkable family - Marion, Elisha, Lynn and his beautiful grandchildren. 1/3
